prompt: Take a drink for every L, A, C, M, or U in your name

prompt: Categories: The category is Alcohol brands, first to run out of ideas or thinks too long takes 3 drinks

prompt: Confess the wildest thing you've done after a few drinks. Jury votes on the craziest story. Owner of that story drinks 2 times

prompt: Reveal a guilty pleasure song you can't help but dance to. If anyone else in the group loves it too, give out 3 drinks. If no one does, you drink 3 times

prompt: Share the name of the celebrity you'd most want to have a wild night out with. Everyone votes on the most unexpected choice. Winner (or loser, depending on perspective) drinks 2 times

prompt: Without naming the title, describe the plot of your favorite book in one sentence. Others guess. If no one gets it, you drink

title: Rock, Paper, Scissors
prompt: Play a quick game of Rock, Paper, Scissors. The loser takes a drink.
